original: intros f n x y H. destruct n. - simpl in *. tauto. - simpl in *. destruct H as [[Hcont1 Hderiv1] [Hderiv2 Hsub]]. destruct Hsub as [Hd1 [Hd2 [IHn1 IHn2]]]. split. + apply continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc with (g := fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u). * apply locally_2d_forall. intros; reflexivity. * apply Hcont1. + split. * auto. * split. -- apply Hd1. -- apply IHn1.
